body.name: TCL Air Purifier for Home Room Bedroom True H13 HEPA Air Filter Remove 99.97% Smoke Odor Pet Dander Dust Pollen Mold Air Cleaner Metal Design with Night Light
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 16 hrs 32 mins
features: CLEANER AIR IN ONLY 15 MINUTES: Your Breeva Air Purifier takes as little as 15 minutes to filter rooms up to 161 ft. sq. or in as little as 30 minutes for rooms up to 322 sq. ft. *

BREEVA 3-STAGE FILTRATION SYSTEM: Features a pre-filter, True HEPA (H13), and activated carbon filter that eliminates 99.97% of dust, pollen, mold, bacteria, and other airborne particles as well as absorbs odor, smoke, and volatile organic compounds that can be found in household cleaning supplies. (Filter Life 3-6 months)^
360-DEGREE CLEAN: The tabletop designed tower provides 360-degree air intake and propels clean, fresh air throughout your room from the top of the unit.

SLEEP SOUNDLY, WAKE UP REFRESHED: Enjoy a peaceful, full night of sleep with Breeva's sleep mode, which operates a level quieter than a whisper allowing you to sleep soundly and wake up to clean, fresh air.
CLEAN AIR ON YOUR TIME: The Breeva Air Purifier is built with simplicity in mind. Users can set the Breeva to turn off in 1, 2, 4, and 8-hour intervals using the Timer feature.

ADDITIONAL FEATURES: No need to guess when to change your filter. Your Breeva air filter notifies you of your filter's status using LED indicators. Also, the panel lock feature ensures that no child or furry friend accidentally changes your settings.

MINIMALIST DESIGN THAT’S SURPRISINGLY COLORFUL: The Breeva’s minimalistic tabletop design features a multi-color ambient light so you can pick the color that suits your mood (Blue/Green/Purple/Rainbow).
body.description: Experience fresher, cleaner air in only 15 minutes with Breeva!*. Featuring a 3-stage filtration system, you can breathe easy knowing Breeva is eliminating 99.97% of dust, pollen, mold, bacteria, and other airborne particles while simultaneously absorbing odors, smoke, and volatile organic compounds that can be found in household cleaning supplies. The three stages include a pre-filter, True HEPA (H13), and activated carbon filter. The sleek tower design intakes air from all 360-degrees and circulates it through your whole room (perfect for rooms between 161 sq. ft. and 322 sq. ft.) †. Breeva lets you rest easy and wake up refreshed to clean air with Sleep mode. Sleep mode is quiet… like really quiet so you never have to worry about it disturbing you (26 decibels). Operation and maintenance of your Breeva air purifier are simple and painless with the built-in timer, child lock, and filter replacement reminder. Discover what it is like to breathe easy with Breeva.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Bigger than I thought for this price which was nice. When using high speed, it does give off "white noise" but its not too loud and not irritating. The ambient RGB lighting was a nice touch. I have a 700sqft apartment and the whole place cleaned and refreshed in less than an hour. We have 5 animals; 2 dogs, 2 cats and a gecko and I can even notice a difference in them. No sneezing, less itchy, no rashy red irritation from allergens outside. House also smells so nice. Jusy clean. No odors. And we have litter boxes.... Im impressed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Powerful for cigarette smoke, very quiet
reviews.reviewText: My mother recently moved in with us, she is a very heavy smoker... and refuses to go outside to do it, desperate trying to find the best air purifier I could find.. I ultimately decided on this one, because of his great reviews..Overall I am very happy with this purchase, I find it’s totally worth the price tag.. it does a terrific job at clearing up the cigarette smell.. before owning it the smell radiated the whole house, my kids were going to school smelling like it and All.I placed this purifier in the hallway outside of her room, and it has completely alleviated the problem.. It’s also extremely quiet as well!The filter itself lasts quite some time, this machine has filtered out of very good amount of smoke over the past 3 weeks .. my mother smoke 5 packs a day, and The filter is still going strong . The replacement is very easy to find and also extremely easy to replace.. when the time does come. it’s also helped tremendously with dust, this has been a problem in my older home for quite some time, I am considering purchasing another one for the first floor just for this problem.The colorful lights are an added bonus really cool and create a peaceful mood..This air purifier, is an amazing machine! Totally worth the price! Highly recommended

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great, silent running, vibrant colors, good touch controls and the air smells great.
reviews.reviewText: I needed another air purifier for my mom's room, where this one looked to have the airflow I was looking for. Out of the box, this is made really well, good solid design, good motor and fan system, and one of the best air filters that I have ever seen where it has good thickness and at the same time, the motor can actually push air through it...where this is amazing in itself. The controls are touch sensitive and work flawlessly. The fan is super quiet, even on higher speeds. Love the variations of light, and the timer is a big plus too. No cons, can't think of a single one where I am very happy with the purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Clears the air wonderfully
reviews.reviewText: I have a pellet stove and at times when it starts up, some odors will come into my house. I bought this to clear the air for dog dander and the odors from the pellet stove. It works wonderfully for that however, it is a little bit loud. I bought one for my granddaughter as well and she loves it. It helps her sleep. I just have to turn the volume up on the TV a little bit more because of the fan sound from the purifier. I love the lights. Are usually keep it on one instead of having the lights change. It’s a great option to have for the ambience of the room .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I live it
reviews.reviewText: I live this air purifier, works great I have next to my newborns bassinet and it really cleans the air. The light works great as a night light.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have two dogs at home, and the constant dander in my house is crazy. This air purifier has worked wonders I have noticed since we’ve got this at my house doesn’t get us dusty as it used to and the air feels lighter.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 12, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fresh, clean air!
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this on special...couldn't resist the price, so I figured "why not".I just plugged it in yesterday for the first time, and honestly, within a few hours, I could definitely tell the difference in the air quality. I have pets, dogs and cats! I also have asthma and allergies to just about everything!I usually get pretty congested in my lungs, and do a lot of coughing, plus do nebulizer breathing treatments often, but since this has been running and cleaning the air, I've felt that I'm breathing much better, and my cough is almost nonexistent. This is just in one day!Yes, I'm very satisfied with my purchase. It's very easy to set up and use. Nice and quiet. If you put it on the sleep mode, you can't even hear it!I saw that it's still on sale, so purchased second one yesterday 💗

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The price was right and the performance was to my satisfaction.
